May 31, 1909 D Shrewsbury Contest (Shropshire Section)

Verdi's Works [arr. W. Rimmer]
Shrewsbury, Shropshire Prizes 1st £8, 2nd £6, 3rd £4, 4th £2. March contest 1st Jackfield, 2nd Whitchurch. 7 bands competed.
